property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: correctValues
property.value: {"Registering myMap, should print true", "true", "Registering myMap again, should print false", "false", "Registering yourMap, should print true", "true", "Printing maps. badMap is not registered, should not be printed.", "{ myMapName: { mapName: myMapName, spaceType: Euclidean, coordinateSystem: Joey }, yourMapName: { mapName: yourMapName, spaceType: Topological, coordinateSystem: Sally } }", "Creating and registering sampleEntity", "Attempting to add sampleEntity to myMap (should print true)", "true", "Attempting to add sampleEntity to badMap (should print exception)", "Cannot add an entity to an unregistred map{ mapName: badMapName, spaceType: Euclidean, coordinateSystem: Joey }", "Attempting to remove sampleEntity from myMap (should print true)", "true", "Attempting to remove sampleEntity from badMap (should print exception)", "Cannot remove an entity from an unregistred map{ mapName: badMapName, spaceType: Euclidean, coordinateSystem: Joey }", "Printing contents of local repo as JSON", "{\"maps\":{\"myMapName\":{\"spaceType\":\"Euclidean\",\"coordinateSystem\":{\"name\":\"Joey\"},\"mapName\":\"myMapName\",\"mapEntities\":{}},\"yourMapName\":{\"spaceType\":\"Topological\",\"coordinateSystem\":{\"name\":\"Sally\"},\"mapName\":\"yourMapName\",\"mapEntities\":{}}},\"coordinateTransformations\":{},\"entities\":{\"sampleEntity\":{\"name\":\"sampleEntity\",\"containingMap\":null,\"aliases\":{},\"placements\":{},\"occupancies\":{}}}}"}
